subject: Hello
body:
Hello 
I am Mrs. Joyce Ray the wife of the late Mr. Richard Ray.
I am an Asian American Citizen, my husband worked with the Brunei Shell Petroleum Co Sdn Bhd (BSP) for twenty years before he died in the year 2012.
We were married for ten years without a child. My Husband died after a brief illness that lasted for only two weeks.
Since his death I have decided not to remarry or get a child outside my matrimonial home. When my late husband was alive we deposited the sum of $5.5 Million with a Bank in Turkey. The bank management just wrote me as the beneficiary to come forward to sign for the release of this fund or rather issue a letter of authorization to somebody to receive it on my behalf if I can not come over. Presently, I'm in a hospital where I have been undergoing treatment for esophageal cancer. My doctor has told me that I have only a few months to live.
It is my last wish to see this money distributed to charity organizations, Because my husband, relatives and friends have plundered so much of my wealth since my illness, I cannot live with the agony of entrusting this huge responsibility to any of them.
Please, I'm seeking for any honest person who will get the Funds from the Bank. And use this money to fund the poor, orphanages, widows and charity organizations.
I took this decision because I don't have any child that will inherit this money and I don't want my husband's hard earned money to be misused by his greedy relatives. I don't want a situation where this money will be used in an ungodly manner. Hence the reason for taking this bold decision.
I am not afraid of death hence I know where I am going if I die. Due to the state of my health. I can not communicate by phone because my illness has affected my throat. I prefer to communicate by email. I will appreciate it if you are willing and promise never to betray me when you receive this money in your bank account.
As soon as I receive your reply I shall give you the contact details of the bank in Turkey with the letter I will give you as she will be the one to assist you in laying claims for these funds.
Thanks
Yours Truly,
Mrs.Joyce Ray
Email to reply: 
mrsjoycerayjoyce0097@aol.com

subject: Re:    Hello
body:
Hello Mrs. Joyce Ray,

I'm deeply moved by your story and I'm sorry to hear about your current health condition. It's admirable that you want to use the funds for charity and help those in need.

However, I have a few questions if you don't mind. How did you come across my contact information? And why did you choose me specifically for this task? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Mathew

subject: Re:    Hello
body:
Hello  Mathew,  
Thank you for your interest and kind reply. May God bless you. I will say, it's God who directs our parts. I came across your email when I was searching for the church of God people who I can will the funds in their name to carry out this godly project on my behalf And use the money to fund the poor, orphanages, widows and charity organizations. and your name and email appeared. It is not a mistake but God's directions as I believed.
I took this decision because I don't have any child that will inherit this money and I don't want my husband's hard earned money to be misused by his greedy relatives. I don't want a situation where this money will be used in an ungodly manner. Hence the reason for taking this bold decision.
I will issue you a letter of authorization to receive the funds on my behalf as soon as you are willing to carry out this project on my behalf as I have a little time to live.
As soon as I receive your reply I shall give you the contact details of the bank with the letter I will give you as she will be the one to assist you in laying claims for these funds.
Thanks
Yours Truly,
Mrs. Joyce Ray

subject: Re:    Hello
body:
Hello Mrs. Joyce Ray,

Thank you for your heartfelt message and for considering me to carry out this noble task. I am truly humbled by your trust in me. It's indeed a divine intervention that my name appeared to you.

I understand the importance of using these funds in a godly manner, especially for the benefit of those who are less fortunate. However, I would like to know more about this project. Could you please provide more details? What kind of activities or initiatives do you envision these funds being used for?

Also, could you tell me more about the bank that will be assisting in transferring these funds? It would be helpful to know their procedures and requirements.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Mathew
